title: My new favourite thing to do
body: Anyone that remotely talks crap or is an asshole, instant report. After being chat restricted for something like 140 games in a row or something stupid now I just report everyone, turns out because the system is so broken they get chat restricted too. System is so broken may as well abuse it

replies.body:
Any confirmation on how it actually works?

Or just how You Think it works?

But aye if that's how it actually functions then man, it needs an overhaul.
I have started a new hobby, keeping track of how many idiots I have blocked. i'm at 770 at the moment.
It's based on amount of reports rather than an actual screening method. Therefore, after people get inevitably reported (1500 ELO everyone just reports for no reason) you end up chat restricted :)

Like there have been countless games where I have not spoken a peep (saving sentences due to chat restriction) and at the end I get reported for verbal abuse.......which then adds another 20-25 games of chat restriction automatically as I've been reported during my "improvement time"
